text:
I am using the JAXP SAXParser APIs to parse a huge xml file (600MB). The memory 
consumption for this is around 1GB whereas if I switch to 1.4.4, the memory 
consumption for the same comes to around 250MB. I am wondering if there are 
memory leaks in 1.4.3 or has some feature been added to 1.4.4 that is causing 
this. The problem is encountered on both Windows 2000 and SunOS 5.8. Since it 
is not easy for me to switch to 1.4.4 due to other dependencies, it would be 
nice to hear your feedback.
creator: amit.arora@trilogy.com
